an1.235:1.1: “The foremost of my nun disciples in seniority is Mahāpajāpatī Gotamī.
an1.238:1.1: … who have memorized the monastic law is Paṭācārā.
an1.239:1.1: … who speak on the teaching is Dhammadinnā.
an1.243:1.1: … with swift insight is Bhaddā of the Curly Hair.
an1.244:1.1: … who recollect past lives is Bhaddā daughter of Kapila.
an1.245:1.1: … who have attained great insight is Bhaddakaccānā.
an1.246:1.1: … who wear coarse robes is Kisāgotamī.
an1.247:1.1: … who are committed to faith is Siṅgāla’s Mother.”
